title: U.S. Outlines Timetable To Force ISIS Out Of Mosul
teaser: Mosul is Iraq's second-largest city, and it has been under the control of the self-proclaimed Islamic State, also known as ISIS, since June. The effort to force ISIS out could begin as early as April.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
